name: ShaggyShooters3D
description:
Alpha 0.9 : NEW MAP OMG ITS AMAZING (for me lol)

Alpha 0.7 : Ragdolls

Alpha 0.6 : Main menu, Menu music

Alpha 0.5.1 : Sound Effects, New Graphics

Alpha 0.5 : Killing Enimes, Enemy Health, Score

Alpha 0.4 : Scooby Snacks (make u move rly fast), Range

Alpha 0.3.1 : RPG (omg its so op)

Alpha 0.3 : Respawning, Enemy Spawning

Alpha 0.2 : Bullet Force, Assault Rifle, Gun Switching, Crouching

Alpha 0.1 : Release, Pistol, Movement

(big updates are in bold)

Controls : 1 - Assault Rifle || 2 - Pistol || 3 - RPG || Shift - Crouch || V - Spawn Enemy || B - Respawn ||
